name: Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher
description:
In Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher, players take on the role of an up-and-coming rancher to discover, raise, and train Ultra Kaiju for competition. 

The game features more than 200 kinds of Kaiju including combination variations to collect using Keywords or NFC-enabled devices.

In addition to enjoying unique movements from Ultra Kaiju not typically seen in past works, Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher sets the stage for epic clashes of monstrous proportions reminiscent of classic Ultraman bouts.

Discover Many Types Of Ultra Kaiju
There are more than 200 kinds of Kaiju including combination variations to collect using Keyword or NFC-enabled devices. Discover popular Kaiju such as Gomora, Zetton, Alien Baltan, and many more!

Raise and Train Your Kaiju
Feed, train, and explore to unleash the full strength of your Kaiju.

Compete in Tournaments
Battle to become the ultimate kaiju trainer.

Combine Kaiju
Combine two Ultra Kaiju to unlock new variations.
